title: OLFA 45mm Quick-Change Rotary Cutter (RTY-2/C) - Rotary Fabric Cutter w/ Blade Cover for Crafts, Sewing, Quilting, Replacement Blade: OLFA RB45-1 (Aqua)
description: The OLFA 45mm Quick-Change Rotary Cutter, Aqua is the perfect addition to any craft space. Quality design and construction make this the perfect tool for projects big and small. Whether you are a quilter, garment sewer, cosplay artist, or general crafter the OLFA 45mm rotary cutter is great for cutting a variety of materials such as fleece, felt, cotton, wool, foam, among others. The quick-change blade feature makes blade changes a snap. The contoured handle allows for comfortable cutting. This package contains one 45mm rotary cutter. OLFA RTY-2/C, 1110720. Imported.
